sub_title: Author at Koninklijke Boom uitgevers | Cambridge English Assessment Examiner | English Teacher | Copywriter
summary:
Teaching English is my main expertise, with 8 years happily spent in classrooms. I have a love for vocabulary and finding the exact words for a translation, not only literally but also in the sense of the message/sentiment that is being conveyed. 
Because of this I devour books. For fun and educational purposes, from philosophy and classics to sci-fi and mythology. 
Teaching is undeniably connected to learning thus as a teacher you must continue to learn and develop yourself, it's not just up to your students to progress. As a fast and fervent learner I strive to expand my skills and knowledge.

Besides teaching I have a fair share of experience in the hospitality branch. This means that I have a strong focus on the client at all times. Adapting to the individual and being creative are valuable qualities which I definitely possess.
I have also learnt to be clear, a fast thinker, concise when it comes to communication, organised and meticulously clean. This, naturally comes with a loving weakness for food and drink related subjects.

In the future I'm hoping to find a pleasant work place where I can continue to grow as a professional as well as a person.

We are writing lessons and providing each other with feedback. This is how we work towards the final versions of the English lessons in the KERN Engels series.", 'title': 'Contributing Author', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 785621, 'name': 'Cambridge Assessment English', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQF764moHT29Og/company-logo_400_400/0/1650876512808?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=pH-RRaWnRnyz-pUBSnTt1iuFD2HzsLQyECljMjtu4QE', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/cambridge-university-press-assessment-english/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Alcalá de Henares, Community of Madrid, Spain', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Cambridge University Press & Assessment English', 'description': "Every spring/summer many schools in Spain hold Cambridge English qualification tests. English teachers are recruited in the different communities to monitor and in the case of the speaking sections execute and mark this part of the exam.

You must first follow a course, practise marking students (assessing) and presenting the speaking tasks to exam candidates according to a script (interlocuting). When examining you take turns with a colleague, each playing one of these parts. My team, organised by Queen's English Centre in Alcalá de Henares, would visit schools within the province of Madrid.", 'title': 'Cambridge Examiner', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Learn and Play Languages', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Alcalá de Henares, Community of Madrid, Spain', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'Learn and Play Languages', 'description': "Learn and Play in Alcalá de Henares is a language centre with it's own methodology based around the multiple intelligences by Howard Gardner. Lessons are built around different interactions in English which correspond to this multitude of intelligences. A class with songs, followed by a kinesthetic/movement class, then an academic class, and so the cycle continues.

Here I planned classes, helped develop curriculums, did cooking classes in English, taught general English as well as exam preparation for Cambridge/ TOEIC/TOEFL and had a great time whilst teaching and motivating students.

I also did a first aid course with the Spanish Red Cross, covering first aid for babies/children and adults. Renewed every year. Jolly Phonics/Grammar was another workshop that we all attended and utilised in the classroom.", 'title': 'English Second Language Teacher', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'First English Centre', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Jaén, Andalusia, Spain', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'First English Centre', 'description': "My trip to Spain was intended as a year abroad to make up my mind. I started as a nanny/English tutor with and au pair family. Within 6 months I was offered a position as an English teacher. I got qualified that following summer and stayed on for another year after that.

English has always come easily, combined with the joy of teaching and adapting teaching methods depending on the class or even student I was hooked. Teaching and languages have struck a happy note that's there to stay. 

On a day to day basis I would prepare classes for many different age groups. In my youngest class the students were 6 years old and the adult students would range into their fifties or sixties at times. Naturally I would teach, mostly from a course book and sometimes through my own materials. I taught general English classes but also exam preparation for 'Trinity' or 'Cambridge' English qualifications.", 'title': 'English Second Language Teacher', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 8093, 'name': 'Subway', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQHNBvsVI1j06g/company-logo_400_400/0/1597247374404?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=b0Bxh-H9dTDFGopt1JCjNcW4mhP9t0Ww0ce_5c8LhLo', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/subway/', 'employees': {'start': 501, 'end': 1000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Groningen, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'company': 'Subway', 'description': 'As a shift supervisor I helped with and managed co-workers with the daily running of our Subway Sandwich shop. From working at/counting to till, to preparing produce and storing orders. 

As an assistant manager taking/ordering stock, managing replacements in case of illnesses and opening/closing the establishment were added tasks.', 'title': 'Shift Supervisor and later Assistant Manager', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2561659, 'name': 'Hotel Prinsenhof Groningen', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQH106PQvBPoQw/company-logo_400_400/0/1551966931471?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=6qMGK3_ci7aiC2vB3jd-cDnSVEpKyJcvvObLwKPHf_M', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/prinsenhof-groningen/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Groningen, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'Prinsenhof Groningen', 'description': 'At Hotel Prinsenhof I was working in housekeeping to pay for my studies and livelihood as well as doing my internship as a cook in their beautiful kitchen. 

In housekeeping I had to adhere to strict instructions as the building we were cleaning is a monument and the furniture placed in the rooms was of high quality, care and speed were of the utmost importance. This whilst making sure to not disturb guests in any way. Besides cleaning rooms and common areas, organising and restocking storage was also part of the daily tasks.

As far as my internship is concerned I very much love food and especially adapting dishes to specific diets/wishes. However what I ended up really missing was the connection with whom you are doing the work for, your diners. My responsibilities were mainly related to preparing cooks stations and produce as far as possible before service, receiving and putting away ordered produce, independently managing breakfast service, managing a share of the lunch service, assisting other cooks where needed and cleaning/storing according to health and safety regulations.', 'title': 'Housekeeping and Breakfast/Lunch/Mise-en-place cook', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 2271, 'name': 'Starbucks', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEQxk9y2rk7Hw/company-logo_400_400/0/1519856020155?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=cXjb29iKvmUBQvZqvPDFILBW3fN7vD32Xs6fNFcnho8', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/starbucks/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Groningen, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'Starbucks', 'description': 'In the position of barista I thrived on customer relations. Nothing more satisfying than causing someone to smile by putting in a little extra effort (like a drawing on the coffee sleeve/cup or obviously remembering a person and order).

Some of the daily activities were; preparing the work environment and beverages, managing the till and counting it at the end of a shift/day, customer relations, monitoring colleagues/work routines with the help of an assessment form, restocking and presenting merchandise, participating/organising tastings of the coffee and food to make interesting pairings to recommend to customers.', 'title': 'Barista', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 10031312, 'name': 'Albert Heijn', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQE_asn6DhgWeg/company-logo_400_400/0/1549381485173?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=KkaEl54ibnYu4SFHHk70z7zqkSLMlQwvoTJfhcH5LOU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/albert-heijn/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Groningen, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'Albert Heijn', 'description': 'My first formal job. My responsibilities were to prepare (in the case of product demonstrations) and present produce in the most attractive way possible, to refill stock, attend customers, clean and always be representative. 

I adopted a wide range of task fairly quickly as I adore variety and enjoy a multitude of activities to switch between.', 'title': 'Supermarket employee Deli/Bakery/Product Demo/ Fruit & Vegetables', 'employment_type': 'Part-time'}]}]
